problem.markdown:
>>1.At total reflux no. of stages is :<< (x) Minimum ( ) Maximum ( ) Infinite ( ) None of these
>>2.In a distillation column of dia 1 ft which of the following is more preferred : :<< ( ) Tray (x) Packings ( ) None ( ) Both
>>3.If feed is introduced in the reboiler there will be no :<< ( ) Stripping section ( ) Rectifying section (x) Lower operating line ( ) Both 1 and 3
